content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: IECAT
      operator: equal_to
      value: INCLUSION
    - name: IEORRES
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: N
Core:
  Id: CORE-000001
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when IECAT="INCLUSION" and IEORRES^="N".
Outcome:
  Message: IECAT equals "INCLUSION" and IEORRES is not equal to "N".
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0176
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The intent of the domain model is to collect responses
                  to only those criteria that the subject did not meet, and not the
                  responses to all criteria.
                Document: SDTM v3.4
                Section: 6.3.4
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - IE

json.Description: Raise an error when IECAT="INCLUSION" and IEORRES^="N".

Outcome.Message: IECAT equals "INCLUSION" and IEORRES is not equal to "N".

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The intent of the domain model is to collect responses to only those criteria that the subject did not meet, and not the responses to all criteria.
